tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT,
    arrival_date DATE,
    departure_date DATE,
    product_name TEXT,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE CrossDockEfficiencyAnalysis (
    shipment_id INT,
    arrival_date DATE,
    departure_date DATE,
    processing_time_hrs DECIMAL,
    analysis_result VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    trend_id INT,
    trend_name VARCHAR,
    trend_description TEXT,
    data_range_start DATE,
    data_range_end DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trends (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cross_docking_efficiency (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  efficiency_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_sales (
  id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
  sale_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  trend_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cross_docking_efficiency (
  efficiency_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  dock_id INT NOT NULL,
  efficiency_score DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE warehouse_locations (
  location_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  state VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE product_inventory (
  inventory_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
